thread.title: A couple met an elderly man while walking on the beach. sweet old
thread.title_full: A couple met an elderly man while walking on the beach. The sweet old

author: Team Social
title: A couple met an elderly man while walking on the beach. sweet old
text:
A couple met an elderly man while walking on the beach. The sweet old guy offered to take a picture of the couple. However, unwittingly, he left them with a hilarious momento instead.
Tyguy462 shared the hilarious incident on Reddit.
Sweet old man at the beach: “Would you like me to take a photo of you two love birds?”
My wife: “Yes please!”
Nailed it.
The old guy took an accidental selfie, capturing the image of the couple in the reflection of his sunglasses.
Many redditors believe that the picture was intentional and the guy was trolling the happy couple. To which the author Tyguy462 replied, “This was a thought I had…like he gets some enjoyment from intentionally doing this to couples who are too sweet to point out his error.”
Either this sweet old man is adorable or an epic troll. Guess we’ll never know.
